data.text:
NetViewer 1.3.2

Continue to app

Free Version

Publisher Description

NetViewer - Remotely view, playback and backup your DHD series DVRs.

Remotely view, playback and backup your DHD series DVRs.

This app supports the followings models:

DHD-204

DHD-208

DHD-216

This app is designed for DHD series DVRs and includes the

following functions:

.Live View

.Remote Playback

.Remote Backup

.PTZ Control

About NetViewer

NetViewer is a free app for Android published in the System Maintenance list of apps, part of System Utilities.

The company that develops NetViewer is Mark Hsu. The latest version released by its developer is 1.3.2.

To install NetViewer on your Android device, just click the green Continue To App button above to start the installation process. The app is listed on our website since 2021-01-28 and was downloaded 27 times. We have already checked if the download link is safe, however for your own protection we recommend that you scan the downloaded app with your antivirus. Your antivirus may detect the NetViewer as malware as malware if the download link to remote.iWatchDVR.Netviewer is broken.

How to install NetViewer on your Android device:

Click on the Continue To App button on our website. This will redirect you to Google Play.

Once the NetViewer is shown in the Google Play listing of your Android device, you can start its download and installation. Tap on the Install button located below the search bar and to the right of the app icon.

A pop-up window with the permissions required by NetViewer will be shown. Click on Accept to continue the process.

NetViewer will be downloaded onto your device, displaying a progress. Once the download completes, the installation will start and you'll get a notification after the installation is finished.

Version History

Here you can find the changelog of NetViewer since it was posted on our website on 2017-01-01. The latest version is 1.3.2 and it was updated on soft112.com on 12 June, 2024. See below the changes in each version:

version 1.3

posted on 2021-01-29

1. 以管理員名稱不為admin登入時, 無法操作 PTZ 的問題.

2. 在多分割下開載入高解析度的影像串流時會有明顯鋸齒的問題.

version 1.3.2

posted on 2021-01-28

1.修正部分三星手機無法使用硬體解碼

2.預設使用軟解碼

version 1.9.20191111

posted on 2019-11-11

1.目標 API 等級調整為 28

2.簡化 APP 直立介面，與橫向介面同步

version 1.9.20190918

posted on 2019-09-27

1.移除百度 SDK 內容符合 Google 規範

2.修正小米等部分型號手機使用通知功能無反應的問題

version 1.9.20181225

posted on 2019-02-21

1.搭配 Android 9.0 新架構與 FCM 推播方式進行修改

2.優化 UI 介面

version 1.9.20160812-.-

posted on 2016-08-23

移除DVR列表返回鍵，避免App記憶已刪除的DVR
